'''Forceful Fists of Frost''' is [[Wriothesley]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Unlike most [[Catalyst]]-wielding characters, Wriothesley's Normal and Charged Attacks produce [[hitlag]] when hitting an opponent.
*Unlike most Catalyst-wielding characters, and like most [[Sword]]- and [[Polearm]]-wielding characters, Wriothesley's Charged Attack must be preceded by at least one Normal Attack.
;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|There Shall Be a Plea for Justice|character=Wriothesley|talent=Forceful Fists of Frost}}
